014package org.jdbi.v3.core.argument;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.util.Collection;
018import java.util.Collections;
019import java.util.Optional;
020import java.util.Set;
021import java.util.function.Function;
022import java.util.stream.Collectors;
023
024import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.QualifiedType;
026import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.Qualifiers;
027import org.jdbi.v3.meta.Beta;
028
029/**
030 * Inspect a value with optional static qualified type information and produce an {@link Argument}
031 * that binds the value to a prepared statement.
032 *
033 * <p>Make sure to override {@link Object#toString} in your {@link Argument} instances if you want
034 * to be able to log their values with an {@link org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.SqlLogger}.
035 *
036 * <p>Note that {@code null} is handled specially in a few cases, and a few {@code Jdbi} features
037 * assume you'll return an instance of {@link NullArgument} when you intend to bind null.
038 */
039@FunctionalInterface
040public interface QualifiedArgumentFactory {
041    /**
042     * Returns an {@link Argument} for the given value if the factory supports it; empty otherwise.
043     *
044     * @param type the known qualified type of value. Depending on the situation this may be a full
045     *     generic signature e.g. {@link java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType}, a {@link Class}, or
046     *     Object.class if no type information is known.
047     * @param value the value to convert into an {@link Argument}
048     * @param config the config registry, for composition
049     * @return an argument for the given value if this factory supports it, or <code>Optional.empty()
050     *     </code> otherwise.
051     * @see org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext#findArgumentFor(QualifiedType, Object)
052     * @see Arguments#findFor(QualifiedType, Object)
053     * @see QualifiedType
054     */
055    Optional<Argument> build(QualifiedType<?> type, Object value, ConfigRegistry config);
056
057    /**
058     * Adapts an {@link ArgumentFactory} into a QualifiedArgumentFactory. The returned factory only
059     * matches qualified types with zero qualifiers.
060     *
061     * @param config the ConfigRegistry
062     * @param factory the factory to adapt
063     */
064    static QualifiedArgumentFactory adapt(ConfigRegistry config, ArgumentFactory factory) {
065        if (factory instanceof ArgumentFactory.Preparable) {
066            return adapt(config, (ArgumentFactory.Preparable) factory);
067        }
068        Set<Annotation> qualifiers = config.get(Qualifiers.class).findFor(factory.getClass());
069        return (type, value, cfg) ->
070            type.getQualifiers().equals(qualifiers)
071                ? factory.build(type.getType(), value, cfg)
072                : Optional.empty();
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Adapts an {@link ArgumentFactory.Preparable} into a QualifiedArgumentFactory.Preparable.
077     * The returned factory only matches qualified types with zero qualifiers.
078     *
079     * @param factory the factory to adapt
080     */
081    static QualifiedArgumentFactory.Preparable adapt(ConfigRegistry config, ArgumentFactory.Preparable factory) {
082        return QualifiedArgumentFactory.Preparable.adapt(config, factory);
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * QualifiedArgumentFactory extension interface that allows preparing arguments for efficient batch binding.
087     */
088    @Beta
089    interface Preparable extends QualifiedArgumentFactory {
090        Optional<Function<Object, Argument>> prepare(QualifiedType<?> type, ConfigRegistry config);
091
092        /**
093         * @deprecated no longer used
094         */
095        @Deprecated
096        default Collection<QualifiedType<?>> prePreparedTypes() {
097            return Collections.emptyList();
098        }
099
100        /**
101         * Adapts an {@link ArgumentFactory.Preparable} into a QualifiedArgumentFactory.Preparable
102         * The returned factory only matches qualified types with zero qualifiers.
103         *
104         * @param factory the factory to adapt
105         */
106        static QualifiedArgumentFactory.Preparable adapt(ConfigRegistry config, ArgumentFactory.Preparable factory) {
107            return new Preparable() {
108                Set<Annotation> qualifiers =
109                        config.get(Qualifiers.class)
110                        .findFor(factory.getClass());
111
112                Collection<QualifiedType<?>> prePreparedTypes = Collections.unmodifiableList(
113                        factory.prePreparedTypes().stream()
114                            .map(QualifiedType::of)
115                            .map(qt -> qt.withAnnotations(qualifiers))
116                            .collect(Collectors.toList()));
117
118                @Override
119                public Optional<Argument> build(QualifiedType<?> type, Object value, ConfigRegistry cfg) {
120                    return type.getQualifiers().equals(qualifiers)
121                            ? factory.build(type.getType(), value, cfg)
122                            : Optional.empty();
123                }
124
125                @Override
126                public Optional<Function<Object, Argument>> prepare(QualifiedType<?> type, ConfigRegistry cfg) {
127                    return type.getQualifiers().equals(qualifiers)
128                            ? factory.prepare(type.getType(), cfg)
129                            : Optional.empty();
130                }
131
132                @Override
133                public Collection<QualifiedType<?>> prePreparedTypes() {
134                    return prePreparedTypes;
135                }
136
137                @Override
138                public String toString() {
139                    return "Qualified[" + factory + "]";
140                }
141            };
142        }
143    }
144}
